R

rects - Variable in class ClockHand
Array of Rectangle objects (the clock hands)
rotateRect(Rectangle, double) - Static method in class Controller
The rotateRect method applies a rotation transformation to a Rectangle (clock hand).
run() - Method in class Hour
The run method updates the position of each hour hand every hour.
run() - Method in class Minute
The run method updates the position of each minute hand every minute.
run() - Method in class Second
The run method updates the position of each second hand every second.
